mapper.insert: INSERT INTO walk_crew SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, district_id = #{districtId}, leaderId = #{leaderId}, createdAt = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, description, district_id AS districtId, leaderId, createdAt FROM walk_crew WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE walk_crew SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, area = #{area}, leaderId = #{leaderId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO walk_crew_member SET memberId = #{memberId}, crewId = #{crewId}, joinedAt = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT w.*, d.city FROM walk_crew w JOIN district d ON w.district_id = d.id ORDER BY w.createdAt DESC
